channel.title: Chidera Kingsley
channel.description: Software Developer at World Wide Techies (Talent Yard)

item.title: Create and publish your own React component library with Storybook, TypeScript, and Tailwind
item.description: A guide on how to create your own custom React component library with Storybook, TypeScript, and Tailwind, and publish them to npm.
item.author: chidera@geniuskingsley.dev (Chidera Kingsley)

item.title: How to merge a git repository into Nx
item.description: A guide on how to merge any existing app or library into a Nx monorepo.
item.author: chidera@geniuskingsley.dev (Chidera Kingsley)

item.title: How to share assets to multiple apps/libraries in Nx
item.description: A guide on how to share assets to all your apps/libraries in a Nx workspace
item.author: chidera@geniuskingsley.dev (Chidera Kingsley)

item.title: JavaScript Promise and Async/Await
item.description: A short visual guide on what a Promise is in JavaScript, and how to avoid call back hell.
item.author: chidera@geniuskingsley.dev (Chidera Kingsley)

item.title: Passing an argument to a selector in Redux toolkit
item.description: A short guide on how to pass arguments to a selector in Redux toolkit.
item.author: chidera@geniuskingsley.dev (Chidera Kingsley)

item.title: How to type the setState function from the useState hook
item.description: A deep dive into how to properly type a setState function from the useState hook.
item.author: chidera@geniuskingsley.dev (Chidera Kingsley)

item.title: Why does React need keys?
item.description: This article will show you what is the purpose if the “key” prop in React and some best practices around it.
item.author: chidera@geniuskingsley.dev (Chidera Kingsley)
